body_html:
Hi,

The Bazel version should be unrelated to this issue and the problem happens on desktop. It is ok to leave them as N/A. Thanks.

A strange update:
I could allocate slightly more GPU memory by using the following 0.82 memory fraction:
gpu_options = tf.GPUOptions(per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.82)

But the script would be terminated by the following error even if memory is successfully allocated
2018-09-30 23:44:44.818714: E T:\src\github\tensorflow\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_dnn.cc:352] Could not create cudnn handle: CUDNN_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED

body:
Hi,

The Bazel version should be unrelated to this issue and the problem happens on desktop. It is ok to leave them as N/A. Thanks. 

A strange update:
I could allocate slightly more GPU memory by using the following 0.82 memory fraction:
    gpu_options = tf.GPUOptions(per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.82)

But the script would be terminated by the following error even if memory is successfully allocated
2018-09-30 23:44:44.818714: E T:\src\github\tensorflow\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_dnn.cc:352] Could not create cudnn handle: CUDNN_STATUS_ALLOC_FAILED
